      • drive

        public static void drive(lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
         lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
         double leftRadius,
         double rightRadius,
         double width)
        Test drives the robot in a square 4 times to see the calculate error. Obtained from lab 2. Modify parameters in Odometer.java to desired performance.
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - Left Motor object.
        rightMotor - Right Motor object.
        leftRadius - radius of left wheel in cm
        rightRadius - radius of right wheel in cm
        width - width of chassis in cm
